Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides with high proteolytic resistance for combating gram-negative bacteria.
Literature.Author: Wang J, Song J, Yang Z, He S, Yang Y, Feng X, Dou X, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>128 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:IC50=324 µM,Intestinal Porcine Epithelial Cells IPEC-J2:IC50=125.5 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=>128µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=16µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MBC=2µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli(MBC=1µM),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli K88(MBC=1µM),Escherichia coli K99(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli K99(MBC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21630(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21630(MBC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MBC=32-64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21625(MIC=64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21625(MBC=64µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MBC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=1µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MBC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(MIC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(MBC=4µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MBC=1µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MBC=4µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=5647µM)
